title: Valentine’s Day single-page gift site (wine/cream/gold) with editable Love Letter & Memories

requirements.summary: Apply a warm, intimate, luxurious wine-red/cream palette with subtle gold accents consistently across the single page.
acceptanceCriteria: All sections use the specified palette with consistent spacing, borders, and corner radius for a cohesive look.
Gold is used sparingly (e.g., dividers, icons, small highlights) and does not overpower the wine/cream base.

file_operations.description: Define global theme tokens (wine/cream/gold), consistent spacing/radius/shadow utilities, and base page styling to enforce the required palette and cohesive look across all sections.
Extend Tailwind theme with Valentine palette tokens and any needed animation utilities to support consistent wine/cream/gold styling across the app.

requirements.summary: Build the single-page structure with the five required sections in order and ensure required exact texts are present.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero displays the specified title text exactly: “To the Love of My Life”.
Final section’s last line ends with the exact substring: by vkayyy.
All five sections are present and visibly distinct.

file_operations.description: Implement the single-page layout rendering the five required sections in order (Hero, Love Letter, Memories, Reasons, Final Closing) with the exact required texts and distinct section wrappers.
Ensure the app renders the single-page Valentine experience (wire the created App.tsx if needed) without introducing additional routes/pages.

requirements.summary: Add elegant romantic typography with clear heading hierarchy and readable long-form love-letter text.
acceptanceCriteria: Headings use a distinct script/serif style; body text uses a clean sans/legible font.
Long-form text (love letter) is readable on mobile and desktop (no overly small font sizes, adequate line-height).

file_operations.description: Add font imports (script/serif for headings, clean sans for body), establish H1/H2/H3 hierarchy, and set comfortable line-height and responsive font sizing for long-form reading (especially in the love letter preview/editor).

requirements.summary: Alternate section backgrounds (cream/wine) with soft gradients, subtle pattern overlays, and consistent rounded cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Adjacent sections alternate between cream and wine backgrounds.
At least one subtle pattern overlay is visible on both a cream section and a wine section without harming text contrast.
Cards use rounded corners and consistent shadow/border treatment across sections.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable Section wrapper that supports alternating cream/wine variants, optional gradient, and pattern overlay layering using generated assets. (If using shadcn-ui primitives, use them for consistent containers; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Create a shared card surface wrapper (rounded corners + consistent border/shadow) used by Love Letter, Memories cards, and Reasons items for cohesive styling. (If using shadcn-ui Card, use it to provide the base; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wrap each of the five sections with the Section component, alternating cream/wine backgrounds in order and applying consistent card styling for content blocks.

requirements.summary: Add gentle fade-in on section entry and subtle hover/focus transitions for interactive elements.
acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in as they enter the viewport (or on initial load for above-the-fold hero) with non-jarring durations/easing.
Buttons/cards/inputs have subtle hover/focus transitions (e.g., shadow/transform/color) consistent with the romantic theme.
Animations do not block interaction and do not cause noticeable layout shift.

file_operations.description: Implement a small IntersectionObserver-based hook to apply a fade/translate-in class when a section enters the viewport.
Add keyframes/classes for soft fade-in animations and define consistent hover/focus transition styles for buttons, cards, inputs, and editable areas.
Apply in-view fade behavior to sections (hero on load; subsequent sections on scroll) using the useInViewFade hook so animations are consistent and non-blocking.

requirements.summary: Create an editable Love Letter section with a styled live preview and a one-click copy-to-clipboard control with feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: User can type and edit the love letter directly on the page.
A preview panel updates as the user types (or on save) and matches the site’s styling.
A copy action copies the full letter text to the clipboard and provides clear UI feedback (e.g., “Copied”).

file_operations.description: Implement the Love Letter editor (textarea) + styled preview panel using the site typography, plus a “Copy letter” control with clear feedback. (If using shadcn-ui Button/Textarea, use them for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Create a small hook to copy text to the clipboard and return UI-friendly status (idle/success/error) for “Copied” feedback.
Wire LoveLetterSection into the page in the required order and ensure it inherits the section/card styling.

requirements.summary: Build an editable Memories grid with add/update, clipboard image paste into a card, and per-card copy of text content.
acceptanceCriteria: User can add or edit at least a few memory cards (title + description) on-page.
Pasting an image into a memory card attaches/displays the image in that card (in browsers that support clipboard image paste).
Each memory card has a copy action that copies its textual content to the clipboard.

file_operations.description: Implement an editable memories grid with add/update for title+description, per-card copy action (title+description), and per-card clipboard image paste handling (display pasted image when available). (If using shadcn-ui Card/Button/Input/Textarea, use them to standardize UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Create a focused MemoryCard component encapsulating editing controls, paste target, image preview, and copy action behavior. (If using shadcn-ui components, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire MemoriesSection into the page in the required order and ensure it uses the shared card styling and animations.

requirements.summary: Create a responsive “Reasons I Love You” section with romantic text items and themed decorative icons styled with subtle gold accents.
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes multiple reason items with either icon + text or icon-accented text.
Icons visually match the theme and do not look like default unstyled emojis (unless intentionally styled to fit).
Layout is responsive (e.g., 1 column on mobile, multi-column on larger screens).

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive set of rounded reason cards/list items with romantic text and decorative icons styled in subtle gold. Use the generated icon asset for consistent themed visuals rather than default emojis. (If using shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Wire ReasonsSection into the page in the required order and ensure the layout is responsive and matches the shared card/section styling.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly for pattern overlays and decorative accents.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Pattern overlays are implemented using these assets and maintain readable contrast for text in each section.

file_operations.description: Add the generated seamless heart pattern overlay asset (wine-red on transparent) as a static public asset.
Add the generated seamless heart pattern overlay asset (creamy-white on transparent) as a static public asset.
Add the generated minimal romantic icon set (heart/rose/star) in subtle gold as a static public asset.

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-pattern-wine.dim_1600x1600.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-pattern-cream.dim_1600x1600.png for subtle section overlays, and define utility classes for controlled opacity/contrast.

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-icons-gold.dim_512x512.png to render gold heart/rose/star decorative accents within reason items (direct frontend reference; no backend involvement).
